title: GamGox
author: GamGox
content: Hi Bitcointalk fam,I aim to offer specialized Telegram services catering to all types of cryptocurrency projects, encompassing DeFi ecosystem, TON ecosystem, NFT and GameFi, Metaverse, AI-related projects, Layer-2 solutions, Solana, blockchain for sports, blockchain for music, DAOs, and other diverse crypto ecosystems.We offer four types of Telegram promotion services:1. Invite Active Subscribers to your Telegram community(group)Facilitating the acquisition of up to 200,000 engaged and organic Telegram subscribers from any Telegram community to augment your Telegram group is a tailored service we offer.e.g. You own a Telegram signal and market prediction group and you want to having 30,000 active traders on your group.So you sending an order for 30k subscribers to us and then we will select 30k ACTIVE traders through exchanges like Binance/OKX/Kucoin/dYdX/MEXC/BingX and other exchanges and inviting them these communities to your Telegram community.QuoteIt's essential to note that this service exclusively pertains to Telegram groups, not channels.We carefully choose the most recently active users while ensuring the removal of "deleted accounts" and those that have been inactive for an extended period.2. Telegram Private Message Ads:We are going to sending your message to thousands/millions of active targeted Telegram users.We will deliver your message to thousands of actively targeted Telegram users. We carefully select the most recently active users in the groups where you want to send messages, or we identify the most relevant groups in your business category and dispatch your message to a substantial user base.3. MTProto Proxy Promotion: (Ideal for projects exclusively utilizing Telegram channels)Harness the power of MTProto proxies to reach users in countries with Telegram censorship.>Check out what MTProto is: MTProto Proxy Overview>Explore countries with Telegram censorship: Government Censorship of TelegramEstimated +30 Millions users using MTProto around the world.4. Crypto-Targeted Telegram Advertising Campaign (500k+ Subscribers):(Ideal for projects exclusively utilizing Telegram channels)Strategy: POST-PinPropel your project into the limelight on more than 10 crypto-centric Telegram channels boasting 500k+ active subscribers.Customized posts strategically sent and pinned for 1/2/4/8 weeks, based on your preferences.ğŸ’¸ Pricing Details:Competitively priced packages tailored to your selected channels and services.Reach out to us for a personalized quote aligned with your project's unique requirements.ğŸ”— Contact Information:For inquiries and to embark on your project's Telegram promotion journey, kindly reach out to us at Telegram:https://t.me/qbit_LenaChannel:https://t.me/GamGoxLet's ascend to new heights together and position your crypto project at the forefront of industry visibility! ğŸš€ğŸŒBest,
